entry.tran: 酒椰叶纤维（用来制作草垫、篮子等）
entry.def: Raffia is a fibre made from palm leaves. It is used to make mats and baskets.

example.ex: Some embroidered tablecloths or made raffia mats.
example.tran: 一些人给桌布绣花或编酒椰叶纤维席子。

means.word_mean: 1. leaf fibers of the raffia palm tree; used to make baskets and mats etc.
2. fiber of a raffia palm used as light cordage and in making hats and baskets

auth_sentence.content: I'm using raffia which is a texture appropriate to the climate on the walls and other local materials, but with a twist.
